question: Which among the following statements was not included in Trump's first address to the US congress?
option1: US will meet the financial obligations of all the NATO members
option2: US will adopt a merit-based immigration system
option3: US will seek the help of its Muslim allies to destroy the ISIS
option4: US will build a great wall on the US-Mexican border
answer: US will meet the financial obligations of all the NATO members
